heroDescription: Empowering Sustainable Land Use with Technology
featureTitle: Our Platform Simplifies Your Carbon Journey
feature1Description: Leverage geospatial data and environmental metrics to assess your land's potential for carbon offset projects.
feature2Description: Easily navigate comprehensive reports and tools to evaluate carbon project viability.
feature3Title: Quantify Verified Carbon Credits with Confidence
feature3Description: Receive trusted, data-backed carbon credit calculations to fuel your sustainability initiatives.
workflowSubtitle: From Land Analysis to Carbon Credit Quantification
workflowDescription: Our platform simplifies the carbon offset process by helping you assess land feasibility, analyze potential, and calculate verified carbon credits.
workflowStep1Description: Provide your land data or select a location to start the carbon analysis process.
workflowStep2Description: Receive an automated feasibility report with quick estimation.
workflowStep3Description: Analyze project potential, environmental data, and carbon credit estimates.
workflowStep4Description: Join carbon projects, integrate your land assets, receive participation tokens.
callToActionSubtitle: Start Your Journey Towards Sustainable Land Management
callToActionDescription: Our platform simplifies the carbon offset process by helping you assess land feasibility, analyze potential, and calculate verified carbon credits.
uploadDragDrop: Drag and drop or click to upload
uploadError: An error occurred while uploading the file.
MultipleOptions: Hold CTRL (or CMD) to select multiple options.
SelectAtLeastOneSpecies: Please select at least one species.
FailedToLoadSpecies: Failed to load species. Please try again later.
relevantIndicators: These are the most relevant indicators for the projects.
agbBgbSocCo2BySpecies: AGB, BGB, SOC and CO2 by Species

impact.title: Impact
impact.content: Impact in the context of carbon credit projects refers to the measurable positive effects that these projects have on reducing greenhouse gas emissions, enhancing biodiversity, and supporting sustainable development in local communities.

investment.title: Investment
investment.content: Investment refers to the total amount of financial resources allocated to the carbon credit projects.

bankable.title: Bankable
bankable.content: Bankable investment refers to the portion of the total investment that is expected to generate a return.

income.title: Income
income.content: Income refers to the revenue generated from the sale of carbon credits.

lands.title: Lands
lands.content: Lands refer to the total area of land involved in the carbon credit projects.

totalco2eq.title: TotalCO2eq
totalco2eq.content: Total CO2 equivalent (CO2eq) represents the total amount of greenhouse gases reduced or sequestered by the carbon credit projects.

area.title: Area
area.content: Area refers to the total land area measured in hectares (Ha) that is involved in the carbon credit projects.

co2eq.title: CO2eq
co2eq.content: CO2 equivalent (CO2eq) per hectare represents the amount of greenhouse gases reduced or sequestered per hectare of land.

co2eq_year.title: CO2eq Year
co2eq_year.content: CO2 equivalent (CO2eq) per hectare per year represents the amount of greenhouse gases reduced or sequestered per hectare of land per year involved in the carbon credit projects.

area_tokens.title: Area Tokens
area_tokens.content: Area Tokens represent the tokenized units of land area involved in the carbon credit projects, used for tracking and trading purposes.

token_value.title: Token Value
token_value.content: Token Value represents the value of each tokenized unit of land area in terms of the amount of CO2 equivalent (CO2eq) it represents.

token_value_total.title: Token Value Total
token_value_total.content: Token Value Total represents the total value of all tokenized units of land area in terms of the total amount of CO2 equivalent (CO2eq) they represent.

default.title: Default
default.content: No specific information available for this indicator.
